item.title: VyprVPN from Golden Frog now includes a server in Mumbai
item.description:
Golden Frog, a company dedicated to online privacy and internet accessibility, has expanded its services to India. This new server, located in Mumbai, marks the company’s 14th in Asia and aims to provide Indian internet users with a secure and unrestricted online experience through their VyprVPN service. “India, with its vast population and rapidly growing tech sector, will benefit greatly from this new server location,” says Sunday Yokubaitis, President of Golden Frog...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/vyprvpn-from-golden-frog-now-includes-a-server-in-mumbai/
